text:
{
  "fixed_xml": "<ITEM>
  <REQUESTER>Herr Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung</REQUESTER>
  <REQUEST>
    <ASK>
      Wo folgende Bücher zu einem <PRICE>iraisonablem Preis</PRICE> zu haben seyen:
    </ASK>
    <BOOK>
      <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE>
      </BIBL>
    </BOOK>
    <BOOK>
      <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE>
        <YEAR>1738</YEAR>
        <YEAR>1739</YEAR>
      </BIBL>
    </BOOK>
    <BOOK>
      <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE>
        <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>
        <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
      </BIBL>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE>
          <EDITOR>Joannis Clerici</EDITOR>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR>
          <TITLE>Tristia & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE>
          <ANNOTATOR>Sinceri</ANNOTATOR>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR>
          <LANGUAGE>Graece & Latine</LANGUAGE>
          <ANNOTATOR>Bocceri</ANNOTATOR>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR>
          <LANGUAGE>Graece & Latine</LANGUAGE>
          <ANNOTATOR>Schefferi</ANNOTATOR>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR>
          <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR>
          <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
      <BOOK>
        <BIBL>
          <AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR>
          <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
          <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
      </BOOK>
    </BOOK>
  </REQUEST>
</ITEM>",
  "number_of_corrections": 15,
  "explanation": [
    {
      "fix": "Added <REQUESTER> tag for the person making the request.",
      "reason": "The name of the person was not encapsulated in any semantic tag."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <REQUEST> and <ASK> tags to encapsulate the inquiry.",
      "reason": "The request context was not structured."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <PRICE> tag for 'iraisonablem Preis'.",
      "reason": "The price description needed a semantic tag."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <BOOK> tags to encapsulate each bibliographic entry.",
      "reason": "Each book entry should be distinctly marked."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed encoding issues and replaced Unicode escape sequences with readable characters (e.g., '4t½' to '4to', '8v½' to '8vo').",
      "reason": "Unicode sequences were not properly formatted for readability and consistency."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <EDITOR> tag for 'Joannis Clerici'.",
      "reason": "The role of Joannis Clerici was not semantically tagged."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <ANNOTATOR> tags for 'Sinceri', 'Bocceri', and 'Schefferi'.",
      "reason": "The annotators' roles were not semantically tagged."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added <LANGUAGE> tag for 'Graece & Latine'.",
      "reason": "The language description needed a semantic tag."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed the title 'institutiones histor. Christ.' to 'Institutiones histor. Christ.' for proper capitalization.",
      "reason": "Capitalization inconsistency."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed the encoding of 'Tristiam' to 'Tristia'.",
      "reason": "Typographical error in the title."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Ensured each <BIBL> entry is properly nested within <BOOK> tags.",
      "reason": "Improper nesting of bibliographic entries."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added proper closing tags for nested <BOOK> elements.",
      "reason": "Some nested <BIBL> entries were not properly closed."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Consolidated the structure for grouped books under a parent <BOOK> tag.",
      "reason": "Logical grouping of books under a single requester."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Fixed the encoding of '½' to 'o' in '4to' and '8vo'.",
      "reason": "Incorrect encoding for fractional sizes."
    },
    {
      "fix": "Added semantic clarity by separating individual books into distinct <BOOK> tags.",
      "reason": "Improved readability and data structure."
    }
  ]
}
